parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.22

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> System

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Opens Steam overlay with given YT video. Video URL is the end part of the YT URL, starting with '''watch?v<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>...'''. If the user has Steam overlay disabled, the command will display appropriate message to the user and return [[false]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''openYoutubeVideo''' youTubeUrl

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> youTubeUrl: [[String]] - for parameters see: https://developers.google.com/youtube/player_parameters

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>//Open <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UBIAbm7Rt78</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>
_isOpened = [[openYoutubeVideo]] "watch?v=UBIAbm7Rt78";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[openDSInterface]], [[openMap]]
</value></part></template>

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on May 25, 2018 - 15:03 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:celoush|celoush]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
SITREP 00061: For security reasons we have restricted its use to outside scenarios only (e.g. in the game's UI or a mod's UI). (https://dev.arma3.com/post/sitrep-00061)
</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes --></comment></root>
